attributes.action: nationalise coverage of the England rugby team to stop ITV showing the Rugby World Cup
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having just witnessed ITV playing adverts while the England vs USA game kicked off, I consider this the straw that has broken the camel's back. Its coverage is woeful and should be replaced by a proper broadcaster, preferably one that doesn't air advertisements. The Prime Minister must take action for the sake of the sanity of rugby-loving nation.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
